mapper.select: select b.*, p.providerName from bill b left join provider p on b.pid = p.pid where b.bid = #{bid}
mapper.update: UPDATE bill SET bill_code=#{billCode}, bill_name=#{billName}, bill_com=#{billCom}, bill_num=#{billNum}, money=#{money}, pay=#{pay}, pid=#{pid}, create_date=#{createDate} WHERE bid=#{bid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bill ( bill_code, bill_name, bill_com, bill_num, money, pay, pid, create_date ) VALUES ( #{billCode}, #{billName}, #{billCom}, #{billNum}, #{money}, #{pay}, #{pid}, now() )
